title: Improper Restriction of Recursive Entity References in DTDs (&#x27;XML Entity Expansion&#x27;)
overview: If the DTD contains a large number of nested or recursive entities, this can lead to explosive growth of data when parsed, causing a denial of service.
remediation: ::PHASE:Operation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:If possible, prohibit the use of DTDs or use an XML parser that limits the expansion of recursive DTD entities.::PHASE:Implementation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Before parsing XML files with associated DTDs, scan for recursive entity declarations and do not continue parsing potentially explosive content.::
